TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ConnectionStringsExpressionBuilder extends System.Web.Compilation.ExpressionBuilder

summary.span: 检索或生成代码以检索 Web.config 文件的 <> 节中的值。

span.span: Retrieves, or generates code to retrieve, values from the <> section of the Web.config file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类提供对 Web.config 文件的节中的值的访问 `` 。The class provides access to values in the `` section of the Web.config file. ``Web.config 文件的部分包含名称/值对中的连接字符串值。The `` section of the Web.config file contains connection string values in name/value pairs. 通过分配窗体的表达式来检索连接字符串值A connection string value is retrieved by assigning an expression of the form `<%$ ConnectionStrings: secureConnectionString %>` 到控件属性。to a control property. 冒号 (： ) 指定要检索的表达式的类型，而冒号后面的部分表示连接字符串的名称。The part of the expression before the colon (:) designates the type of expression to be retrieved, and the part after the colon signifies the name of the connection string. 前面的表达式将从 Web.config 文件中检索以下值。The preceding expression would retrieve the following value from the Web.config file. `` `` `` 当页分析器遇到带有前缀的表达式时 `ConnectionStrings` ，它将创建类的一个实例 来处理该表达式。When the page parser encounters an expression with the prefix `ConnectionStrings`, it creates an instance of the class to handle the expression. 如果在要编译的页面中遇到表达式，则 对象将生成用于从 Web.config 文件中检索指定连接字符串的代码。If the expression is encountered in a page that will be compiled, the object generates code that retrieves the specified connection string from the Web.config file. 如果在不进行编译的页面中遇到表达式，则在 分析页面时，对象将返回 Web.config 文件中的值。If the expression is encountered in a page that will not be compiled, the object returns the value from the Web.config file when the page is parsed. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何以声明方式使用 控件从运行 Microsoft SQL Server 的计算机中检索数据，并在控件中显示该数据 。The following code example demonstrates how to declaratively use a control to retrieve data from a computer running Microsoft SQL Server and display it in a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_3sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_3sql/CS/sql3cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_3sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_3sql/VB/sql3vb.aspx#1)] 此代码从 Web.config 文件中检索以下连接字符串。The code retrieves the following connection string from the Web.config file. `` `` `` `` ``

span.span: ASP.NET Expressions Overview

summary.span: 从 Web.config 文件的 <> 节返回一个值。

span.span: Returns a value from the <> section of the Web.config file.

returns.span: 与 Web.config 文件的 <> 节中某个键关联的 。

span.span: The associated with a key in the <> section of the Web.config file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 `<%$ ConnectionStrings: secureConnectionString %>` 未编译的页面中遇到形式的表达式时，将调用此方法。This method is called when an expression of the form `<%$ ConnectionStrings: secureConnectionString %>` is encountered in a page that is not compiled. 它从 Web.config 文件的部分中检索相应的值 `` 。It retrieves the appropriate value from the `` section of the Web.config file. 如果参数中包含连接字符串，则此方法通过调用方法来重写方法 `parsedData` ; 如果参数中未包含连接字符串，则通过调用方法 `parsedData` 来重写方法。This method overrides the method by calling the method if a connection string is included in the `parsedData` parameter, or by calling the method if a connection string is not included in the `parsedData` parameter.

exception.span: 未能在 Web.config 文件中找到连接字符串名称。

span.span: The connection string name could not be found in the Web.config file.

summary.span: 返回一个值，该值指示是否可在不编译的页中计算表达式。

span.span: Returns a value indicating whether an expression can be evaluated in a page that is not compiled.
in all cases.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性指示方法是否已 在类中实现。The property indicates whether the method has been implemented in the class. 必须在表达式生成器内实现，以便在未编译的页中计算表达式。 must be implemented within an expression builder for an expression to be evaluated in a page that is not compiled. 支持连接字符串的无编译计算，因此 `true` 总是返回。 supports no-compile evaluation of connection strings, so `true` is always returned.
